footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Lauma | Update Date: 09/19/2025 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Nightweaver's Looking Glass__
BiS and signature weapon, providing everything Lauma and her team needs.

__Etherlight Spindlelute__
Event weapon providing Energy Recharge% and Elemental Mastery. 

__Blackmarrow Lantern__
Craftable option that is best with low energy requirements.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__A Thousand Floating Dreams, Starcaller's Watch,  Sunny Morning Sleep-In__
Ignoring their passives, they are still good statsticks for their EM substat.

__Mappa Mare, Fruit of Fulfillment__
Other craftable options with Elemental Mastery related passives or substats.

__Sacrificial Fragments, Emerald Orb, Magic Guide__
Other last-resort options with Elemental Mastery substats.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery|<goblet> Elemental Mastery|<circlet> Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Runo: Dawnless Rest of Karsikko
**2)** Elemental Burst: Runo: All Hearts Become the Beating Moon
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Peregrination of Linnunrata

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Aim for 150% to 200% Energy Recharge%, with requirements decreasing if using Favonius weapons, Dendro teammates or have Constellation 4. 

As Lauma has a base Elemental Mastery stat, she should aim to have around 800-1000 Elemental Mastery.
